content: 12 12 14 knit to end round 1 knit stitches round 2 k2 2 3 3 4 5 5 p8 10 10 12 12 12 on hold 14 knit to end heel work rounds 1-2 until cuff measures 2 2 5 4 5 flap 5 5 6 5 7 5 8 from cast-on ending with a work in row round 2 heel flap set-up k12 14 16 18 20 22 24 place sts picked up these stitches on hold you will work the heel at both edges of heel flap flap back and forth in row over the next 12 14 16 18 20 22 24 sts heel row 1 rs sl1 knit to end turn row 2 ws sl1 purl to end work in row work row 1-2 a total of 5 6 7 8 9 10 11 times this is 10 12 14 16 18 20 22 row gusset heel turn & foot work in the heel is turned by working a series of short row rounds set-up row 1 rs sl1 k6 6 8 10 12 12 14 ssk k1 turn work set-up row 2 ws sl1 p3 1 3 5 7 5 7 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 rs sl1 knit to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 turn work row 4 ws sl1 purl to 1 st before the gap toe p2tog p1 turn work work in rounds work row 3-4 a total of 1 2 2 2 2 3 3 times - all sts have been worked and 8 8 10 12 14 14 16 sts remain decreases next row rs knit across these heel stitches rye socks - worsted facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 3 gusset toe the sock gusset is formed by picking up stitches the toe is shaped by decreases then grafted then working in the round while decreasing closed pick up and knit 7 8 9 10 11 12 13 sts along round 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker the edge of the heel flap pm k2tog k1 sm twice 4 sts decrease work in pattern across top of foot keeping the round 2 knit garter panel as established pm work rounds 1-2 a total of 2 3 4 4 4 4 5 times pick up and knit the same number of sts as above 16 16 16 20 24 28 28 sts along the other edge of heel flap work round 1 a further 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 times k4 4 5 6 7 7 8 place new bor marker located 12 12 12 16 16 20 20 sts at the bottom of the foot cut yarn leaving a 12 tail graft the toe closed 34 38 44 50 56 60 66 sts finishing round 1 knit round 2 knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 weave in your ends and block your socks sm work in pattern across top of foot to marker share your project
